name: Enchanted
description:
Based on the holiday 2007 film from Disney, Enchanted takes you on an
epic adventure through two very different places: the magical animated
kingdom of Andalasia and modern-day New York City

As Giselle, Prince Edward, and Pip the chipmunk, you'll embark on quests
and activities inspired by the film and beyond, with characters
employing their own magical skills and talents to get out of trouble as
they try to defeat the evil Queen Narissa. As Giselle, you'll summon
animals and sing to thwart the Queen; while playing Edward, you'll ride
a horse and use a your trusty sword to battle enemies and evil boss
characters; and as Pip, you'll race against the clock to collect hidden
items.
